title: Enhancing Practical Competencies in Instructional Design: 4C Competency-Based Physics Teacher Education Design and Assessment

context.prior_knowledge: Basic physics knowledge, foundational understanding of teaching methodologies, and basic concepts of 21st-century skills (4Cs)
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Explain at least three frameworks for designing physics lessons that incorporate 4C competencies.
Achieve over 80% proficiency in applying 4C competency theory through a 21st-century learning knowledge test.
Provide peer feedback using rubrics that evaluate lesson plans (LKPD) and instructional modules.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
